title: GPU sales figures show that AMD is its own greatest enemy
description: The latest report on graphics cards sales shows us that while AMD is highly competitive, Nvidia might not even be its worst enemy.

title: This AMD GPU could have destroyed Nvidia, but we might never see it
description: AMD's next-gen graphics cards may not be as powerful as expected, but they could have been, if this leaked diagram is anything to go by.

title: Amazon expands use of generative AI to summarize product reviews
description: Amazon is rolling out the use of generative-AI technology to summarize customers’ product reviews on its shopping site.
